questions.question: If a single-cylinder diesel engine produces 60 kW of Brake Power and has an efficiency of 35%, what is its Indicated Power?

explanations.a: Indicated Power (kW) = Brake Power (kW) / Efficiency = 60 kW / 0.35 ≈ 171.43 kW

questions.question: If a single-cylinder diesel engine has an Indicated Power of 25 kW and a Brake Power of 22 kW, what is its Mechanical Efficiency?

explanations.a: Mechanical Efficiency (%) = (Brake Power / Indicated Power) * 100 ≈ (22 kW / 25 kW) * 100 ≈ 88%
